post.body: Oh yeah, I think it was worth it. There are few movies I consider worthy of paying ticket price for, but Ben Button earned it.
i freakin' love that song. and that album. i think it's probably my favorite weezer album, and hardly anyone knows it!
don't give in!! i'm so impressed with your quitting skillz, lady. YOU DON'T NEED NO NICOTINE
interesting nugget for you: dogs often yawn sympathetically when they see people yawn, suggesting empathy and self-awareness.
Just finished the book and loved it! It was great to read your story in detail. Beautiful writing & pix; thanks for sharing!
what!! that's terrible! especially considering you'd already paid. sheesh.
Curious Case of Benjamin Button was everything I'd hoped it would be after months of anticipation. Side note, I hate crying in public.
Wow, glad we got such an early start... Stores are definitely getting packed now. Mom and i got probably the last 2 mario kart ds's in town.
Hittin' up the after Christmas sales with Mom!
Time for presents, wheeee! Merry Christmas, everybody!
Today was an odd day. Going to bed now.
what the hell is it about music boxes/music boxlike things? hit me right in the feelgoods. i wanna collect 'em. (music boxes, not feelgoods)
will be very excited to show off her Christmas present!
Love Actually time!
may die of an eyeball explosion before her migraine medicine refill is available in an hour.
Less than 5 minutes into Wanted and it's already one of the worst movies I've ever seen. Not that I expected any differently.
Reading The Daily Coyote (the book, not the blog) and wishing I had more than $27.04 in my checking account.
Whataburger, indeed.
Gettin my shop on with mom on the last friday before christmas!
is stuck waiting on a train she can't even see in Calera.
